00014 WApplication *createApplication(const WEnvironment& env)
00015 {
00016   WApplication *app = new WApplication(env);
00017   app->setTitle(L"File explorer example");
00018   app->useStyleSheet("filetree.css");
00019 
00020   FileTreeTable *treeTable = new FileTreeTable("/home/kdforc0/project/wt");
00021   treeTable->resize(WLength(500), WLength());
00022 
00023   app->root()->addWidget(treeTable);
00024 
00025   return app;
00026 }
